item.description:
The Enneagram explains 9 unique personality perspectives. Even though we have all 9 “types,” one is more basic to one’s motivation, thinking and behavior. Discover your core type and how to communicate well to every type. Herb acts out each type with hats and songs, interviews people to determine their core type, pointing out growth and relating tips geared for each type. Look forward to an experience of insight, humor and personal revelation that can change your life - and learn how to relate confidently to types that are a challenge. Use the Enneagram to develop the strengths of all 9 types, let go of your attachment to your type and live in a more spiritually free place.

Taught by Herb Pearce, Enneagram expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and teacher of over 2000 Enneagram workshops, Enneagram therapist for individuals, couples and families.
781 748 3737

at Sadhana Spiritual Center
100 Brickhill Ave., S. Portland, ME
207-772-6898 cmyers@sadhaname.com

To register: Call or email Colleen
Saturday, January 29

item.name: Enneagram Workshop - Understand Yourself, Improve Relationships & Free Your Ego
